content.rendered:
Creator Richie Mehta

Directed by Richie Mehta. Tanuj Chopra

Written by Richie Mehta. Toshan Lal Sahu. Virat Basoya. Ensia Mirza. Mayank Tewari. Bhavesh Mandalia. Sanyuktha Chawla Shaikh. Shubhra Swarup. Vidit Tripathi

Cast Shefali Shah( DCP Vartika Chaturvedi12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Rajesh Tailang( Inspector Bhupendra Singh12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Rasika Dugal( Neeti Singh (IPS Trainee) / …12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Anurag Arora( Sub-Inspector Jairaj Singh12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Adil Hussain( Kumar Vijay (CP)12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Gopal Datt( Sub-Inspector Sudhir Kumar12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Sidharth Bhardwaj( Sho Subhash Gupta12 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Yashaswini Dayama( Chandni ‘Chandu’ / …8 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Denzil Smith( Vishal Chaturvedi8 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Jaya Bhattacharya( Sub-Inspector & Juvenile Welfare Officer Vimla Bhardwaj7 episodes, 2019 ). Vinod Sharawat( SHO Vinod Tiwari7 episodes, 2019 ). Swati Bhatia( Ira6 episodes, 2019 ). Mridul Sharma( Jai Singh6 episodes, 2019 ). Abhilasha Singh( Deepika6 episodes, 2019 ). Sanjay Bishnoi( Akash / …6 episodes, 2019 ). Shobhna Bharadwaj( Kiran6 episodes, 2019 ). Gaurav Rana( SHO Rakesh Verma5 episodes, 2019 ). Amitabh Acharya( Sub-Inspector Ashok Sharma5 episodes, 2019 ). Ramji Bali( Sub-Inspector Prakash Shukla5 episodes, 2019 ). Vipin Katyal( Arif- Police Officer5 episodes, 2019 ). Jaiti Khera( Dr. Teena Bhutani5 episodes, 2019 ). Vijay Rajauria( Prem5 episodes, 2019 ). Jatin Goswami( Bablu4 episodes, 2022 ). Sanjiv Chopra( Chief Minister4 episodes, 2019 ). Kundan Negi( Akash’s Uncle4 episodes, 2019 ). Harsh Hansraj( Brajesh4 episodes, 2019 ). Vicky Vishwas( Vikas4 episodes, 2019 ). Govind Singh( Amar Singh4 episodes, 2019 ). Lalit Goswami( Avinash4 episodes, 2019 ). Ayush Sehgal( Arunesh4 episodes, 2019 ). Sudeep Singh( Rahul Goswami4 episodes, 2019 ). Anmol Chadha( Arjun4 episodes, 2019 ). Rhea Bedi( Smriti4 episodes, 2019 ). Asif Ali( Head Constable Ram Pratap3 episodes, 2019 ). Raj Sharma( Informer3 episodes, 2019 ). Sadanand Patil( SHO Ajay Vishwas3 episodes, 2019 ). Abhishek Kumar( Sonu3 episodes, 2019 ). Chandan Kumar( Narayan3 episodes, 2019 ). Virendra( Gopi3 episodes, 2019 ). Danish Husain( Advocate Vineet Singh3 episodes, 2022 ). Rajhu Sharmaa( Politician3 episodes, 2022 ). Avijit Dutt( Gururaj Dixit / …2 episodes, 2019 ). Aakash Dahiya( Devinder Singh2 episodes, 2019 ). Gehna Seth( Aparna2 episodes, 2019 ). Vijay Laxmi( Geeta2 episodes, 2019 ). Vijaylaxmi Singh( Geeta2 episodes, 2019 ). Bhupesh Pandya( Veeru2 episodes, 2019 ). Chetan Sharma( Ashu2 episodes, 2019 ). Kusum Nanda( Reena2 episodes, 2019 ). Shreshtha( Neeti’s Mother2 episodes, 2019 ). Pankaj Gupta( Alok2 episodes, 2019 ). Smriti Chouhan( Dipti2 episodes, 2019 ). Hemant Rathi( Bhose2 episodes, 2019 ). Tillotama Shome( Lata Solanki2 episodes, 2022 ). Vanshika Saluja( Ritika Monga1 episode, 2022 ). Mukesh Chhabra( SHO Karauli1 episode, 2019 ). Dinker Sharma( Ashwin1 episode, 2019 ). Vijay Kumar Dogra( Mr. Rai1 episode, 2019 ). Pawan Nagpal( Harish1 episode, 2019 ). Animesh Panwar( Maninder1 episode, 2019 ). Dev Chauhan( Aseem1 episode, 2019 ). Siddharth Malik( Zakir1 episode, 2019 ). Sumit Chandra( Police Informer1 episode, 2019 ). Kaleem Zafar( Banke Lal1 episode, 2019 ). Parinaz Jal( Manju1 episode, 2019 ). Ashish Pathak( Bhaskar Kumar1 episode, 2019 ). Harsh Mahendru( Rajiv Chabbra1 episode, 2019 ). Gulshan Walia( Adersh Anand1 episode, 2019 ). Vijay Kumar Sharma( Brij Mehta1 episode, 2019 ). Mohit Tyagi( Prashant1 episode, 2019 ). Namrata Chopra( Female Judge1 episode, 2019 ). Gayatri Sharma( Magistrate1 episode, 2019 ). Ashok Mehta( Informer1 episode, 2019 ). Neha Sharma( Rhebha1 episode, 2019 ). Abhushan( Bahadur1 episode, 2019 ). Flora Bose( Bua-Ji1 episode, 2019 ). Ankur Srivastava( Mr. Bhatia1 episode, 2019 ). Sajjanji Bishnoi( Akash1 episode, 2019 ). Amit Kumar( Maninder’s Father1 episode, 2019 ). Rajiv Kanaujia( Dada Singh1 episode, 2019 ). Rangoli Goyal( Duty Officer1 episode, 2019 ). Abhushan Ji( Bahadur1 episode, 2019 ). Krishnakanth( Phupha-Ji1 episode, 2019 ). Chandan( Narayan1 episode, 2019 ). Ronjini Chakraborty( Lata Solanki1 episode, 2022 ). Vikas Gupta(1 episode, 2022 ). Arsh Parminder Shah( Jeweler1 episode, 2022 ). Ankit Sharma(1 episode, 2022 ). Vyom Yadav(1 episode, 2022 ). Aarti Sharma( News Anchor1 episode, 2022 ). Srestha Banerjee( Journalist Poonam (uncredited)1 episode, 2019 ). Amit Gujral( Pharmacist (uncredited)1 episode, 2022)

Language Hindi. English

Producers Kilian Kerwin. Apoorva Bakshi. Aaron Kaplan. Sidney Kimmel. Brian Kornreich. Jeff Sagansky. Florence Sloan. David A. Stern. Sanjay Bachani. Steven N. Bray. Robert Friedland. Pooja Kohli. John Penotti. Rohan Pujara. Monisha Thyagarajan. Jitesh Upade. Michael Hogan. Devanshu Asthana. Vicky Vijay. Shaan Vyas. Vipul Mathur. Navmeet Singh. Tushar Radhakisan Tupe

Production Film Karavan. Golden Karavan. Ivanhoe Pictures.

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix

Season 2

Episodes 5
